definition: to be just about to/to be on the point of
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: The car must break down just when we were about to start off.
sentences.chinese: 我们正要出发时偏偏车又坏了。

sentences.english: The one time it is acceptable to swallow an interrupt is when you know the thread is about to exit.
sentences.chinese: 惟一可以生吞中断的时候是您知道线程正要退出。

sentences.english: We were about to start when it began to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我们正要出发，就在这时天下起雨来。

sentences.english: But I couldn't do it, since I was about to make Laputa at that time.
sentences.chinese: 但是我不能作，因为那个时候我正要作天空之城。

sentences.english: Hitoshi was going to say goodbye, but his father cleared his throat.
sentences.chinese: 仁正要说再见，可是他父亲清了清嗓子。

sentences.english: A lorry was going to dump sugarcane into the hopper.
sentences.chinese: 拼装车正要倾倒一车甘蔗至转装台的漏斗。

sentences.english: A little girl is walking across the street.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩正要穿越马路。

sentences.english: We were just going to leave when Tom fell and hurt his knee.
sentences.chinese: 我们正要走，当汤姆摔伤他的膝盖时。

sentences.english: We had just started to curl up in our sleeping bags when we both heard a loud crack.
sentences.chinese: 我们正要钻进睡袋休息，忽然听到一声很大的噼啪声。

sentences.english: The patrol car was passing the crossing beside the She-Tzuo-Liao flag station.
sentences.chinese: 巡道车正要通过施厝寮旗站旁的平交道。

sentences.english: And now the witching hour is upon us.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个神秘的时刻正要到来。

sentences.english: When the postman arrived, I was leaving the house.
sentences.chinese: 诱孑员到达时，我正要离开那所房子。

sentences.english: The undersea battle is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 海面下的战争正要开始。

sentences.english: The bull elephant is attacking us.
sentences.chinese: 这头公象正要攻击我们。

sentences.english: The day XiaShi present in the evening, the practice of two were going home before.
sentences.chinese: 这天黄昏，夏实呈现在了正要回家的修二的面前。
